prompts: Create a sleek, blue dragon-like Pokemon with elegant wings and a streamlined body.
Imagine a mythical creature that can soar through the skies and has psychic powers.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed and grace with a shimmering blue color palette.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that has a calming presence and is known for its intelligence.
Generate an elegant, winged Pokemon that can be found in tranquil mountain areas.
Make a design for a dragon-type Pokemon that radiates both majesty and mystery.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique blend of blue and purple colors, that looks wise and powerful.
